name: Coins Collector Sport Car
description:
This is about speed.
Do you think you'll be able to drive a super car around town? Many have not coped with this mission, but we believe that you are the chosen one. Your mission in this racing game is to collect all the coins from the city in a limited time, without being noticed. Do you think you can handle it?If Sooo, you should hurry because every second counts! Start the adventure right now!

Game Features :
- 6 levels
- A very fast sport car
- A big town to explore
